site_name: Exotic Animal Encounter DBA Debbie Dolittle's Petting Zoo

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The yak’s hair coat was soiled and matted over the hindquarters and along the underside of the animal’s body. A soiled
and matted hair coat can cause discomfort and lead to abnormal skin conditions. The licensee must address the issues
noted with the yak to help ensure the health and well-being of the animal.

The facility does not have an adequate pest control program for insects. Numerous flies were present throughout the
facility and on the animals and their food. Excessive numbers of flies can facilitate disease transmission and cause
irritation and discomfort to the animals. A safe and effective program of pest control for flies must be established and
maintained.
Correct by: September 25, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The yak’s hair coat was soiled and matted over the hindquarters and along the underside of the animal’s body. A soiled 
and matted hair coat can cause discomfort and lead to abnormal skin conditions. The licensee must address the issues 
noted with the yak to help ensure the health and well-being of the animal. 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility does not have an adequate pest control program for insects. Numerous flies were present throughout the 
facility and on the animals and their food. Excessive numbers of flies can facilitate disease transmission and cause 
irritation and discomfort to the animals. A safe and effective program of pest control for flies must be established and 
maintained. 
 
Correct by: September 25, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
